title: The Mohammedan world: beginnings and growth
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and John Smart
brief_description: Presents scenes of mosques and historic landmarks in cities which are a part of the Mohammedan world; life in Baghdad, Damascus, Cairo and Old Jerusalem; discusses Mohammedanism and traces its development; shows the contribution of Mohammedans to western culture in literature, agriculture, chemistry, mathematics and the industrial arts.
